data: Carey Street | Chancery Lane | Law Courts | Messrs. Peters and Carew
Carey Street | Chancery Lane | Law Courts

In Carey Street, Chancery Lane, on the ground floor of a huge block of new buildings facing the Law Courts, were the offices of Messrs. Peters and Carew, solicitors and perpetual commissioners of oaths.
